summary: Some mods I've been working on, unfinished resources, textures, whatever.
descriptionHtml:
I'm trying to get more organized. I've posted a few misc mods & resources here and there, but I have trouble keeping up with comments and whatnot... So this page will be dedicated to things I've worked on over the years. Once I get my hard drive back from my ex, I'll be able to go through all that too.

For now, this is mostly retextures of resources. I've been getting a little texture happy through my treatment. It helps with disappointment. And since I don't really have a lot of time to actually use most of this, I figured maybe someone else would find it useful.Â 

There's also some skin textures I'll never release. Prototypes to my character overhaul. Things I did for funsies. I am keeping some stuff 'off the market', because it's for sure going to be released. Some of this stuff will be too, but I don't care if other people use it before then.

I like textures a lot. I'm a gloomy kind of gal, so most of this is extremely dark. And most of this is unfinished, so keep that in mind. If there are issues, I apologize. This is mostly resource stuff, so you may need some knowledge of Photoshop & NifSkope.

There are also some models I've sculpted. They're extremely high poly, because I'm a graphics snob. If you can get them to work, kudos to you. I'm horrible with Nif files, and I give up. I can do what I want mostly with textures and resources, so I give you the power [huehue].

I give permission to do whatever you want with this mess, just be sure to credit me and other authors if necessary. Don't use any of my resources in a discriminatory manor. I don't tolerate disrespect in any way, shape, or form. I'm kind of a prude.

Have fun. If you have questions, PM me. I probably won't give this page a lot of attention, but I'll try.
author: Gearhog
